website_summaries.verdict: Comparable to Yeti in terms of customer satisfaction, although this one's 20-quart version is much smaller.
pros: Ice easily holds for around 2 days
cons: Additional storage netting not always practical
Can prove to be a bit heavy for its size

customer_reviews.title: Great price, even better product
customer_reviews.text: Great price, even better product. Used on 4th of July weekend camping trip and it kept the drinks and food nice and cold! Ice cubes hardly melted!
customer_reviews.author: RnBrHarris

customer_reviews.title: Good cooler, not 12oz bottle friendly
customer_reviews.text: Needs another practical CM in depth. Worked well for a summer meat/food preservation device across a week. Fits well in the canoe, Dimensionally its not a go-to for (26qt) for limited beverages on the depth aspect.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: like everyone else
customer_reviews.text: With this cooler you get to be "that guy". When people ask why you didn't just buy a Yeti, like everyone else, you can proudley proclaim, "Because I prefer to trade with companies who make their products in America!"
customer_reviews.author: Wil Bowman

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product and Made in the USA
customer_reviews.text: I loved it and I should never have to buy another one. Made Tough to last.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Webb

customer_reviews.title: Stays cold longer then I thought it would.
customer_reviews.text: Kept my soda, water, and Fosters cold all week on 20 lbs of ice. Very nice!
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds expectations!
customer_reviews.text: Kept ice for 5 days. Cold drinks and food during my whole three week vacation! Love this cooler!
customer_reviews.author: Rebstr

customer_reviews.title: Wow😳
customer_reviews.text: Never would I have imagined that I would be so impressed with a cooler but I am and all I can say is wow. An amazing product and would only recommend buying this product and to top it all off its made in the USA🇺🇸
customer_reviews.author: Premier_excavating

customer_reviews.title: Beer doesn't fit, Ugh.
customer_reviews.text: It is a good cooler and does keep things cold an extended period of time as promised. The only reason it is not a 5 star review is that you cannot put bottled beer in it standing up, I cannot believe they designed this product so that if you put bottled beer in it that it will not close. Quite a disappointment when I stocked it up for the 4th of July party and could not close the lid. If you prefer your beer in cans than this is a fantastic cooler, if you prefer it in bottles then you may be disappointed like me.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas A. Whortan

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler. Mostly keep it kept in back of ...
customer_reviews.text: Great cooler. Mostly keep it kept in back of pickup & ice lasts about 3 days. Good deal for the money.
customer_reviews.author: PegzM

customer_reviews.title: A very good ice chest if opened rarely
customer_reviews.text: A very good ice chest if opened rarely. If you open it like normal use for an ice chest, the ice will melt just as fast as any other ice chest. I used it when rving keeping most things in the small electric refrigerator, and keeping seldom needed items in the ORCA. Block ice would last a week, bagged ice for several days.
customer_reviews.author: River Life

customer_reviews.title: Great Cooler.
customer_reviews.text: Cooler came wrapped in plastic bag, inside box, no scratches, or defects found anywhere. Needed a smaller cooler. The ORCA is just the right size (have RTIC 45 qt) for every day use when you don't need to carry a lot and also not as heavy and bulky for handling. Like the fact that it was a little larger than the 20 quart size rotomold coolers other manufacturers sold and it had rope handles. Have not tried to keep anything over a couple of days in it so far. It has retained ice very well and kept drinks cold.
customer_reviews.author: BBB107

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my husband and he absolutely loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great buy. Same great quality as Yeti at a better price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: a good product. The one I got
customer_reviews.text: Overall, a good product. The one I got, the rubber latches wouldn't stay closed so all the insulation in the world is pointless. A few modifications with the Dremel and it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: John Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler. Keeps stuff cold for days
customer_reviews.text: Great cooler. Keeps stuff cold for days. Heavier than I expected, but that's the way this type of cooler is.
customer_reviews.author: W. Rives

customer_reviews.title: Really like the size not to big
customer_reviews.text: Really like the size not to big, I don't have a big crowd of people, to have ice for. just two. so it work great. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Curtis S. Scott

customer_reviews.title: It is super sturdy and holds ice for 24+ hours
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband as a Christmas present, but he got it early because I was so excited. He loves this cooler!! It is super sturdy and holds ice for 24+ hours. The only downfall is that it does not hold beer bottles standing straight up, we just lay them down. It fits an 18 pack of bottles stuffed with ice, but it could probably hold a 24 pack if you didn't use a whole bag of ice. It is the same if not better quality than a Yeti and half the price, it is also not as heavy as the yeti! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Hillary Durso

customer_reviews.title: Holds Ice for Days
customer_reviews.text: A very nice cooler that holds ice for several days! It’s a bit pricey but it is worth it if you use it frequently.
customer_reviews.author: ZROB

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cooler! I compared all the big names and ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent cooler! I compared all the big names and one thing to make sure you understand is that Orca measures their coolers on internal volume. For example, this "26" quart Orca that I got is actually equivalent to the Yeti "40". When you look at it that way, this cooler (which works just as well as the Yeti) is a much better value IMO. You can't go wrong with any of the premium coolers, just make sure you are comparing apples to apples when doing your research and pay close attention to how they measure their volume.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful cooler . As good as yeti but much cheaper price
customer_reviews.text: It keeps ice for days and is a wonderfully tough cooler . I expect that it is the last cooler I will ever have to buy !
customer_reviews.author: Robert F Williamson

product_meta.title: ORCA ORCT026 26qt Tan Cooler
product_meta.description: Containing a root molded construction the Orc 26 Quart Tan Cooler provides maximum strength durability and an integrated insulation technique for optimal retention, keeping ice fresh for approximately 10 days. Features lid gasket ensuring a perfect seal, easy flow drainage spout, ergonomic handles allowing for easy carrying and a whale tail latch keeping lid tightly secured. Includes attached cargo net for added storage space. Product is sold with a lifetime warranty.
feature_bullets: Integrated insulation technique for optimal retention
Includes attached cargo net for added storage space
Lid Gasket to ensure a perfect seal
Flex Grip Handles for Comfortable Portage
Cargo Net Attachment included for added storage
